function: A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
static_description: A responsive web layout with mint cream background (#F5FFFA) and teal-colored elements (#008080). The header includes navigation links to Home, Contests, Results, Photos, and Register. Main content area dynamically loads contest listings, result tables, and photo galleries.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a contest card navigates to the detailed contest page using contestDetailsAPI.
Infinite scroll loading more contests via additional calls to contestDataAPI when reaching the bottom of the list.

function: A backend application that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
static_description: Backend server configured to connect to PostgreSQL instance using provided credentials. No visible UI; serves RESTful endpoints for frontend consumption.

function: Contest announcement posting functionality with title, description, date, and registration details
static_description: Admin-only form interface with input fields for contest title, multi-line description textbox, date pickers for event and registration deadline, location text field, and prize information textarea. Submit button styled in teal.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting the form sends a POST request to adminPostContestAPI with collected form data.
Submit button changes shade slightly on hover for feedback.

resource_dependency.resultsTableSchema: Database table containing participant_id, rank, score, contest_id

function: Contest results display functionality showing participant rankings and scores
static_description: Tabular view listing participants ranked by position. Columns include Rank, Participant Name, Score, and optionally Prize. Background remains mint cream with teal headers.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking column headers sorts the table ascending/descending by that attribute.

function: Contest photo gallery showcasing images from various contests
static_description: Grid-based image gallery with thumbnails arranged in rows. Each thumbnail displays caption metadata such as photographer name and contest year. Lightbox modal opens on click.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking an image opens it in a lightbox overlay with navigation arrows.
Thumbnail captions fade in smoothly over the image.

resource_dependency.searchFunctionality: Query parameter support in contests endpoint

function: User browsing capability for contest announcements, results, and photos
static_description: Search bar at top allows filtering contests by keyword. Filter tabs below allow switching between Announcements, Results, and Photos sections. Content updates dynamically without full page reload.

interaction_and_states.description: Switching tabs filters displayed content accordingly using respective APIs.
Pressing enter after typing in search bar triggers re-fetching of contests with query term applied.

function: User registration functionality for signing up to participate in contests
static_description: Multi-step registration form collecting user name, email address, selected contest, and optional preferences (gear used, bait preference). Teal-themed buttons guide through steps.

interaction_and_states.description: Next/Previous buttons navigate between form steps. Final submission posts data to registrationFormAPI.
Focus moves logically between form fields enhancing accessibility.

resource_dependency.rulesContent: Textual rule descriptions stored per contest

function: Contest information pages displaying details like rules, prizes, and schedules
static_description: Dedicated contest detail page featuring large header banner, followed by collapsible sections for Rules, Schedule, Prizes, and Registration Info. All styled consistently with mint cream background and teal accents.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking section titles expands/collapses detailed content beneath them.

function: Responsive web design with mint cream background and teal colored elements
static_description: Entire site uses consistent color palette defined in CSS variables. Mint cream background spans all pages while teal is used for interactive elements, borders, and highlights. Fully responsive across devices.

resource_dependency.dbSchemaDefinition: CREATE TABLE contests(id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, description TEXT, date DATE, registration_deadline DATE); CREATE TABLE participants(id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, email TEXT); CREATE TABLE results(contest_id INT REFERENCES contests(id), participant_id INT REFERENCES participants(id), rank INT, score NUMERIC); CREATE TABLE photos(id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, url TEXT, caption TEXT, contest_id INT REFERENCES contests(id));

function: Database schema supporting contests, participants, results, and photo galleries
static_description: Relational database structure created during initialization with tables for contests, participants, results, and photos. Foreign key relationships ensure referential integrity.

function: API endpoints for fetching contest data, submitting registrations, and retrieving results
static_description: RESTful API routes exposed under /api namespace handling GET and POST operations for contest data, registration submissions, and result retrieval. Endpoints secured appropriately.

resource_dependency.adminAuthCheck: Middleware to verify admin privileges before allowing access

function: User interface for administrators to post new contest announcements
static_description: Protected route accessible only to authenticated admins presenting a rich form for creating new contest entries. Includes WYSIWYG editor for descriptions and file upload for banners.

interaction_and_states.description: Save button submits completed form to backend via adminPostContestAPI.

resource_dependency.galleryManagementUI: Interface for viewing and deleting uploaded images

function: Photo upload and management system for contest images
static_description: Drag-and-drop zone accepting multiple image uploads. Uploaded images appear as previews with delete options. Integrated with photo storage solution.

interaction_and_states.description: Dragging files onto the drop zone initiates upload process to photoUploadAPI.
Delete icon removes individual images both visually and from backend storage.

function: Registration form capturing user details like name, email, and contest preferences
static_description: Cleanly designed form with clearly labeled inputs for personal details, contest selection dropdown, and checkboxes/radios for preference choices. Styled with mint cream and teal theme.

interaction_and_states.description: Register Now button validates inputs and submits to submitRegistrationAPI upon success.
If cursor is within last input field, pressing Enter submits the form.

resource_dependency.packageScripts: { "install:all": "concurrently \"npm install\" \"cd backend && npm install\"", "dev": "concurrently \"npm run dev:frontend\" \"npm run dev:backend\"" }

function: Package.json configuration with npm run install:all and npm run dev scripts
static_description: Root package.json file containing custom script definitions enabling unified installation and development startup commands.
